title: minecraft:behavior.eat_mob
description: Allows the entity to eat a specified Mob.

eat_animation_time.description: Sets the time in seconds the eat animation should play for. Default value: 1.000000.

eat_mob_sound.description: Sets the sound that should play when eating a mob.

loot_table.description: The loot table for loot to be dropped when eating a mob.

pull_in_force.description: Sets the force which the mob-to-be-eaten is pulled towards the eating mob. Default value: 1.000000.

reach_mob_distance.description: Sets the desired distance to be reached before eating the mob. Default value: 1.000000.

run_speed.description: Sets the entity's speed when running toward the target. Default value: 1.000000.
